other_tests.findings: Lymphangioma circumscriptum with associated mild chronic inflammation consistent with mechanical irritation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A repeat biopsy confirming the original histologic findings was performed.

other_tests.findings: Complete resolution of previously treated lesions at the 1-month follow-up visit.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At the most recent follow-up visit, lymphangiomas could not be detected and the patient reported minimal side effects, stating: ‘this is the best I have been in three years.’
